EmailTemplate.name: Auto Notification on Renewal Automation
EmailTemplate.subject: Auto Notification of Upcoming Renewal Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
Your upcoming Renewal '{!Opportunity.Name}' has been auto created in CRM for your reference and further action.
In case of any clarifications, please reach out to me on sreekanth.u@autorabit.com.
Kind regards, Salesforce CRM Biz Operations
